title: Wrong region related panel
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
v5.0.1

### What did happened?
Panels on the right side are wrong.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14819777/118626411-7146b400-b7fd-11eb-81dd-9b15a4358346.png)
